      • BuildUriFromDmoFieldLang

        public static android.net.Uri BuildUriFromDmoFieldLang(@NonNull
                                                       android.content.Context context,
                                                       java.lang.String dmoId,
                                                       java.lang.String field,
                                                       java.lang.String lang)
        Get uri of the card label content in the GiiftProvider.
        Parameters:
        dmoId - id of the corresponding dmo
        field - field code of the card label being looked for.
        lang - language code
        Returns:
        uri of the card label in the different languages
        See Also:
        {@link com.giift.sdk.data.GiiftProvider}

      • UpdateFromJson

        public static void UpdateFromJson(@NonNull
                                  android.content.Context context,
                                  @NonNull
                                  org.json.JSONObject obj)
        update a card_label field (delete existing labels for dmo and insert again) when dmo updatedAtJSON is greater than dmoUpdatedAtDB into the GiiftProvider from its json description. The dmo id should not be null.
        Parameters:
        context - used to access the GiiftProvider
        obj - json representation of the Dmo
